sentences.sentence: He said it was all a load of cobblers.
sentences.translation: 他说那完全是一派胡言。

sentences.sentence: Three cobblers are more clever than Mr. Zhuge Liang.
sentences.translation: 三个皮匠会比诸葛亮先生更聪明。

sentences.sentence: You'll need to take your shoes to the cobblers to have them mended.
sentences.translation: 你得把鞋子拿到补鞋匠那里修一下。
